## Import Data

```{r, message = FALSE}
ny_gdp_df <- read_xls("gdp-industrytotal.xls", sheet = 1, 
                      range = 'A6:S390', col_names=TRUE) %>% 
  gather(key = "year", value = "gdp", -c("GeoFips", "GeoName")) %>% 
  separate(col = GeoName, into = c("City","State"), sep = ",", remove = TRUE)
```
